Title: Life and Death of the Hollywood Kid
Actors: Min-su Choi, Young Jae Dok-Go, Kyoung-In Hong
Plot: The story of film director Yun Myoggil and his best friend Lim Byoungsuk whom has obsessive with watching American film. Lim gave his playscript to Yun to make a film. Yun begins to realise that the most of script was replicated.
